MonsterTrait.Name: Doomvault Devotion
MonsterTrait.Text: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened .

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1dlO + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

MonsterAction.Name: Javelin
